thread.title: 'Pregnant' Cheryl 'will finally reveal baby bump in L'Oreal ad campaign'
thread.title_full: 'Pregnant' Cheryl 'will finally reveal baby bump in L'Oreal ad campaign'

author: mirror
title: 'Pregnant' Cheryl 'will finally reveal baby bump in L'Oreal ad campaign'
text:
Celebs 'Pregnant' Cheryl 'will finally reveal baby bump in L'Oreal ad campaign' The 33-year-old will reportedly be splashed across billboards, magazines and websites leaving little doubt that she is expecting Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now What we've seen so far of Liam and Cheryl's baby Share this video Get celebs   
She's been spotted with a blossoming baby bump for months now, but Cheryl has kept mum about her apparent pregnancy. 
Some fans have even speculated the singer is already in labour after boyfriend Liam Payne flew back to the UK from Los Angeles. 
But Cheryl will finally go public with her pregnancy in an advertising campaign for L'Oreal, according to The Sun . 
The 33-year-old will reportedly be splashed across billboards, magazines and websites leaving little doubt that she is expecting. Read More George Clooney scolded by Matt Damon for sharing pregnancy news just weeks after discovering they were expecting Cheryl displayed a huge bump back in November (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
The newspaper quoted a source as saying: "The bump is obvious and she is not trying to hide it any more. 
"It is partially visible in the still images but even more so in an accompanying video which will be going out alongside it." The singer's hairdresser Wendy Iles shared this image (Photo: Instagram/Wendyiles_hair) Cheryl's growing bump could clearly be seen in behind-the-scenes snaps (Photo: Instagram) 
Cheryl set tongues wagging last month when a behind-the-scenes clip from a photoshoot emerged showing off her huge bump. 
The mum-to-be blooming figure was highlighted in a skintight black dress as she received some last-minute touch-ups from hairstylist Wendy Iles. 
Fans also speculated that Cheryl may have 'done a Demi Moore' and posed naked as the actress did for Vanity Fair when she was pregnant with daughter Scout in 1991. Read More Fans speculate Cheryl is 'in labour' as Liam Payne jets back to the UK Vanity Fair, August 1991: Demi Moore, Pregnant and Nude (Photo: Vanity Fair) 
The gossip started last week after fashion photographer Mariano Vivanco, 41, took to Instagram to share a behind-the-scenes image captioned 'My Devine @cherylofficialâ€¦'.
